content: Two Out Lesbians Considered for Supreme Court Pam Karlan a Stanford University law professor, is one of two out lesbians rumored to be on Obama's list to replace Supreme Court Justice David Souter, who is due to retire this spring. Kathleen Sullivan the out former dean of Stanford Law School, has also been frequently mentioned as a possible replacement for Souter. >>>http://www.advocate.com/news_detail_ektid82801.asp It may not be one of these two but I feel very confident that President Obama will appoint a woman.

I'm sure the previous administration wouldn't have even considered a gay person.

Their sexual orientation is irrelevant, but it is interesting to see that "out" lesbians are not being automatically excluded from the list of candidates. I'm sure the previous administration wouldn't have even considered a gay person.

content: Two Out Lesbians Considered for Supreme Court Pam Karlan a Stanford University law professor, is one of two out lesbians rumored to be on Obama's list to replace Supreme Court Justice David Souter, who is due to retire this spring. Kathleen Sullivan the out former dean of Stanford Law School, has also been frequently mentioned as a possible replacement for Souter. >>>http://www.advocate.com/news_detail_ektid82801.asp It may not be one of these two but I feel very confident that President Obama will appoint a woman.
